H0.text: where does the path train stop in newark. Newark Broad Street

H1.text: where does the path train stop in newark. Harrison PATH Station

H2.text: where does the path train stop in newark. Newark Liberty International Airport

H3.text: where does the path train stop in newark. Newark Penn Station

A4.text: Newark Penn Station is the western terminus of the Newark–World Trade Center line of the PATH train

A5.text: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey conducted a study on extending PATH's Newark–World Trade Center line from Penn Station to Newark Liberty International Airport Station
